channel.title: Linux
channel.description: Can someone just tell me how to run a runescape server off my linux machine? I know how to on windows... Just I need to know if I need to set mysql up or ssh and what commands to type, I already installed java on it just cant seem to get run.sh to work. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 05:12:36 AM[/size][hr]Any? ? ? ? ? ? ?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 02, 2008, 05:12:58 AM[/size][hr]anyone?
